page.title: 03THE LOCAL NEWSPAPER - 9/5/85
page.content:
{Our views on the LUTTERWORTH MAIL This paper covers a very large community. We have only selected items concerning our area. { {Dunton Bassett Cricket Club}have won their first under 18 match, by 1 run. {For Sale}Ashby Parva Â£43,750.Detached, 3 bedrooms dormer bungalow, good size garden, central heating and garage. {Local County Elections - 2nd May 1985 occurred in the dark due to a power cut. Hot drinks were provided by neighbours until lunchtime, when power was restored. The election was won by Mr G.T.N. Ratcliffe, Conservative. {A talk}to the{LOCAL HISTORY GROUP showed how history can be seen during countryside walks.
{By Christopher Carver and Peter } {Hurford Age 8.
